alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Idaho County through 415 PM PDT... At 351 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Lowell, or 28 miles east of Kamiah, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Idaho County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
